entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52852
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52851
  • Debugging With InteractiveAuto When Changes To Webassembly #52850

Closed

  • How to implement exception handler of last resort? #52786

PullRequests

Created

  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking

Updated

  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
